attributes.action: We DEMAND an OFFICIAL APOLOGY from Parliament to The Continent of Africa
attributes.additional_details: Around 15 million enslaved West Africans perished as a direct result of the Middle passage and on Horrorifc plantations in the Caribbean. This does not include 350 years of Rape, torture, interbreeding, confinement, enslavement, wrongful and illegal transportation of West African citizens. The pain does not stop there, the vestiges of your odious and unequal system persists today, the descendants of slavery still continue to deal with your lust for money and genocide against African people.
attributes.background:
For 300 years starting with Drake and Hawkins in the 16th century, Millions of young West Africans (Africa's most valuable asset) were illegally, immorally and unethically forcibly transported to British Slave Plantations.

https://www.facebook.com/Queen.Nanny/posts/10155348215317494:0
